posts.post_content: It's cool that you get like free creature steal, but there's a number of ways to just kill it and get all your creatures back, nullifying it. You also can't use the creature it steals until the turn after it comes into your control. If you can protect it with maybe shielding plax or vines of vastwood then it could potentially do a lot. I wouldn't play it competitivley though at 6 mana, there's so many ways to remove it at that point in the game.
